entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow this evening and after midnight. Wind south 30 km/h increasing to 50 gusting to 70 early this evening then becoming southwest 30 near midnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 4 May 2023
